data.name: Webinale
data.description: webinale is the conference for digital professionals, trendsetters and makers in the World Wide Web- it’s the optimal crossover platform for knowledge transfer, inspiration and exchange of experience across all industries.

relatedRecords.name: UXinsight 2020 - Creativity in Research
relatedRecords.description: UXinsight is an international event for UX research professionals and anyone interested in UX research. The main conference is on April 6, 2020, in Breda, The Netherlands. relatedRecords.name: stackconf
relatedRecords.description: The former Open Source Data Center Conference has progressively developed its profile from a mainly on-site approach to open source infrastructure solutions to a broader spectrum of agile methods, continuous integration, container, hybrid and cloud technologies.
